attributes.action: allow the BBC to continue using the full licence fee rather than top slicing  or splitting it up in order to subsidise other services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Top slicing of the licence fee / breaking up of the BBC will damage the one good organisation that Britain has.  We seem to be very good at penalising things that do well.  For once, lets continue to allow this organistation to succeed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
